name: yandex-cloud-telegram-bot
description: Template for deploying Node.js Telegram bot to Yandex Cloud Funcions with Serverless framework

scripts.deploy-prod: npm run build && npx --no-install serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && npx --no-install serverless deploy --stage dev

author: https://github.com/toastyboost/
